item.title: fd command
item.description: linux의 fd 명령어는 find명령어를 대체할 수 있는 사용자 친화적인 CLI 입니다. 기본 사용법 $> fd test/1.txt ... TLDR $> tldr fd fd An alternative to find. Aims to be faster and easier to use than find. More information: https://github.com/sharkdp/fd. - Find files matching the given pattern in the current directory: fd pattern - Find files that begin with "foo": fd '^foo' - Find files with a specific extension: fd --extension txt - Find files in a specific directory: fd pattern path/to/dir - Include ignored and hidden files in the search: fd --hidden --no-ignore pattern See also: find Help $> fd --help fd 8.
